text:
Stokeley Clevon Goulbourne (born April 18, 1996), better known by his stage name Ski Mask the Slump God (formerly styled $ki Mask "The Slump God"), is an American rapper and songwriter. He first became known for his work with XXXTentacion and their hip hop collective Members Only. His 2017 songs "Catch Me Outside" and "Babywipe" are certified gold by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). His first album, "Stokeley", was released in November 2018.
Goulbourne was born in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. His father was a rapper who used the stage name "Sin City".
